Списки слов 
=======================================================================

Column {.tabset}
-------------------------------------

### Существительные

```{r}
read_xlsx("word_profiles.xlsx") |> 
  filter(wl_type == "NOUN") |> 
  group_by(lemma_for_site, phrase_for_site) |> 
  summarize(examples = str_c(example, collapse = "\n")) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  arrange(lemma_for_site) |> 
  mutate(phrase_for_site = ifelse(is.na(examples),
                                  phrase_for_site,
                                  glue('<a href="#" data-toggle="tooltip" data-html="true" data-placement="right" title="{examples}">{phrase_for_site}</a>'))) |> 
  select(lemma_for_site, phrase_for_site) |> 
  rename(лемма = lemma_for_site, 
         выражение = phrase_for_site) |> 
  DT::datatable(filter = 'top', 
                escape = FALSE,
                rownames = FALSE,
                options = list(pageLength = 15, 
                               dom = 'tp'))
```
